#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int T,N,ans,j,i;
	int weight[30],maxload[30];
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		ans=0;
		cin>>N;
		for(j=0;j<N;j++)
			cin>>weight[j];
		for(j=0;j<N;j++)
			cin>>maxload[j];
		sort(weight,weight+N);
		sort(maxload,maxload+N);
		i=0;
		j=0;
		while((i<N)&&(j<N))
		{
			if(weight[i]<=maxload[j])
			{
				ans++;
				i++;
				j++;
			}
			else
			j++;
		}
		cout<<endl<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
